snippet.title: Crash Force - Official Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Crash Force is finally entering the Steam Early Access period on Steam (or as we call it Beta). In Early Access, we are giving the chance for people to play test Crash Force, provide feedback and share comments and suggestions on how to best improve Crash Force. 

In Early Access, Crash Force will feature five hovercrafts and every two weeks a new hovercraft will be introduced to a total of nine hovercrafts. One game mode will be available and one map at the beginning of the Early Access. When more people join the Early Access, more maps  and game modes will be available for play testing.

Check out Crash Force on Steam at this link: http://bit.ly/2jG5OR2

Disclaimer: 
To be taken into consideration by all viewers and audiences that the above video gameplay of Crash Force is an early access demonstration and not the actual finished product.

Please consider hitting the Like button if you enjoy our video. It helps us out a lot! 
-------------------------------------
Follow us on Twitter:
http://bit.ly/2bFCX8m
http://bit.ly/2bojRaV

Follow us on Facebook:
http://bit.ly/2ceKKPI
http://bit.ly/2boj7Ct

Website: 
http://bit.ly/2buJ94e

Instagram: 
http://bit.ly/2bSWhzI
-------------------------------------
Crash Force is an amalgamation of a few gaming genres; it is an online multiplayer, arena, shooting game at its core with RPG and racing elements, where the player assumes the role of a hovercraft to annihilate their enemies. The hovercraft are living beings. The players do not drive a hovercraft, they ARE the hovercraft.


Music used: Remember the Dreams by Per Kiilstofte https://machinimasound.com/music/remember-the-dreams/
Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
